AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: orichalcum miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the orichalcum mine controlled by [PAWN_possessive] stronghold. While raw orichalcum was surprisingly easy to excavate, the mines themselves seemed to often end up infested by various vermin, which is where [PAWN_nameDef]'s other skill came in handy.
